message: Let's split it fairly, I'll take 99% and you get 1%. It's a good start, what do you say?
Your offer was a bit greedy Alice. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor. Take it or leave it - the pot's getting smaller for you next round!
Okay, I'll compromise. 40/60 split.  You're getting the better deal, but let's get this over with.  Take it or we keep playing and things get worse for me.
